history.proof: intros x H. strivial use: Pos2Z.opp_pos, Z.eq_mul_1 unfold: inversible.

tactic: inversion H as [z1 H1 H2 | z2 H3 H4 | z3 H5 H6].
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 2 patterns.

original: intros x H. inversion H as [z1 H1 H2 | z2 H3 H4 | z3 H5 H6]. - left. apply Znumtheory.Zmult_one; auto. - right. apply Znumtheory.Zmult_one; auto. - destruct H5 as [H7 | [H8 | H9]]; [left | right | right]; auto.
